title: True Ambition LF Top Laner

embed.description: The latest Tweets from True AmBition, LLC (@TrueAmBitionGG). International gaming organization with teams in multiple games. WorldWide

body:
True Ambition is an international organisation and is in need of a top laner for their LOL team.
If interested please fill out the form below:
IGN - 
Rank - 
Fav Champs - 
Availability -

replies.body:
IGN: LabRat
Rank: Gold 5
Champs: Irelia, Gnar, Lissandra, Fiora, Gangplank
Available pretty much everyday

IGN: ATG DemonSlayer
Rank: Season 5 Plat ( have yet to do my season 6 promos)
Fav Champs: Ryze, Darius, shen, fiora, sion, poppy,olaf and yas
Availablility: Tuesday to friday

IGN - Shinobae
Rank - b4
Fav Champs - Fiora, riven, sion (for top)
Availability - Pretty much all week (only work part time)

Hey bud just throwing my name out there if your still searching, available a lot, my work is night shift work so im on a lot during the day and I prefer a tanky playstyle in the top lane but can be flexible with the likes of hecarim and riven sling me a message if you want to know anything else.

IGN: Dat Outplay
Ur on my friends list xD
